html:
Feb 17 (Reuters) - MONTEA COMM VA MONTE.BR:

  • IS DEVELOPING AN 8,438 M² DELIVERY STATION FOR AMAZON AMZN.O AT BLUE GATE ANTWERP

  • AMAZON WILL CREATE AROUND 50 PERMANENT JOBS AT THE DELIVERY STATION

  • ROUGHLY 200 DRIVERS WORKING FOR THE INDEPENDENT DELIVERY COMPANIES WILL COLLECT PARCELS FROM THE STATION AND DELIVER THEM TO AMAZON CUSTOMERS IN BELGIUM


Further company coverage: MONTE.BR


(Gdansk Newsroom)
